name: The H word
body:
# The H word

Alien learns of home
# Technology Notes:

We used open source tools/libraries LMMS, Audacity, Tiled and TiledSharp. 
# Credits:

Juho - Code & music
Jussi - Character art & code
Matias - Environment art & code

# Platforms:

Web standard (HTML5, Java, JavaScript, Flash)
# Tools and Technologies:

Unity (any product)
